interlinear-text.item: I sacrifice myself for my flower 6

phrase.item: My poor darling, you are wearing a beautiful outfit.
There is nothing I can do, I sacrifice myself for your father's house.
I water the beans, Nuqra came out of the house.
[I] want to kiss her, I sacrifice myself for her father's house.
I directed the water to the high water channel, I remembered my darling.
I became round and rolled in the water channel, I sacrifice myself for her.
